name: places/ChIJB1MqQpxYwokR_Qf_1puyufM
formattedAddress: 315 Central Park W #1200, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 315 Central Park W #1200, New York, NY 10025-7655, USA

originalText.text:
My girlfriend and I applied for one of their apartments. When we showed up to the viewing with the real estate agent we were honest with him, we said one of us has excellent credit and the other has bad credit. He told us to lie on the application and say it was just the one with good credit moving in (even though he collected an application fee for each person) and our application wound up being accepted. Then AFTER accepting our application the management company calls one of our references who did not say anything bad about us but did say that there was two of us so management then decides after accepting the application that they are going to deny because of the one person with bad credit even though we applied exactly how the agent said to and they already accepted it with the person with good credit alone. I find this incredibly ironic after finding out they have terrible reviews everywhere and are not a BBB accredited business. Needless to say don't waist your time.

UPDATE: We contacted our landlord reference and found out that the management company never even contacted her so they lied about the reason for denying us. Very shady business.

originalText.text: One of worst management office I  ever seen , shame about them. They not making money that why they complained. I believed there is way make them learn the lesson. Loser .

originalText.text:
I am a tenant in one of their buildings and they are the worst management ever. Check out my review for “Terrace Court Apartments”, their building on 93rd st and Riverside Dr.

Our building is not properly maintained and it is Impossible to get the Habermans to care or actually get things done.
